mapper.update:
update
set FNum = #{FNum}, FDescribe = #{FDescribe}, FState = #{FState}, FMakeBillsPersoID = #{FMakeBillsPersoID}, FMakeBillsTime = #{FMakeBillsTime}, FCheckPersonID = #{FCheckPersonID}, FCheckTime = #{FCheckTime}, FCheckIdea = #{FCheckIdea}, PurchaseApplyFor_ID = PurchaseApplyFor_ID where PurchaseApplyFor_ID = #{PurchaseApplyFor_ID}
mapper.select: select ,f1.NAME FMakeBillsPerso,f2.NAME FCheckPerson from f LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF f1 ON f.FMakeBillsPersoID = f1.STAFF_ID LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF f2 ON f.FCheckPersonID = f2.STAFF_ID where f.PurchaseApplyFor_ID = #{PurchaseApplyFor_ID}

select ,f1.NAME FMakeBillsPerso,f2.NAME FCheckPerson, CASE WHEN f.FState='结束' THEN '5' WHEN f.FState='驳回' THEN '2' WHEN f.FState='通过' THEN '4' WHEN f.FState='下发' THEN '3' ELSE '1' END AS STATE from f LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF f1 ON f.FMakeBillsPersoID = f1.STAFF_ID LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF f2 ON f.FCheckPersonID = f2.STAFF_ID where 1=1
and ( f.FNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FState LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f1.NAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f2.NAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
[fhstart] ORDER BY STATE,FMakeBillsTime desc [fhend]

select ,f1.NAME FMakeBillsPerso,f2.NAME FCheckPerson from f LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF f1 ON f.FMakeBillsPersoID = f1.STAFF_ID LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF f2 ON f.FCheckPersonID = f2.STAFF_ID where 1=1 and (f.FState='下发' or f.FState='通过' or f.FState='驳回')
and ( f.FNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FState LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f1.NAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f2.NAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
[fhstart] order by FState DESC [fhend]
